document.full_text: the yankees socked four home runs, including two by russell martin, and won despite ivan nova giving up four runs in four and a third innings in boston.
document.title: yankees 9, red sox 4: with power and bullpen, yanks survive shaky start
lines_and_colors: the yankees socked four home runs, including two by russell martin, and won despite ivan nova giving up four runs in four and a third innings in boston.
